name: The Legend of Ember Lake
description:
A quick disclaimer, this game is in an unfinished state and will hopefully be playable within the next two days. For a jam game, I believe it's very well polished but we just need to correct a couple of things with the title menu and gameplay. Thank you for your patience.

A low-poly 3D adventure of two magic wielding children with cinematic cutscenes and an all-original music score. As you explore Ember Lake you will encounter local wildlife and bosses in your search for the Mimic Mother who will grant you one wish if you can defeat her.
